author: Nick Galante

review: I have bought one for each of my tv's and use them everyday. Have not had any problems and it came at a good price.
author: Mike

review: I bought this before the Amazon TV stick came out in conjunction with the Roku device. It works to stream stuff from your phone or laptop to your TV. It works and the quality is great but honestly, it's just not worth it compared to the Amazon TV stick. I have to switch between 2 devices and if I would've known about the TV stick - I would've waited and just purchased that. If you already have a Roku device - then maybe go for this. I do think that it was really easy to set up and pretty user-friendly. I don't like that if I go to someone's house to try to use it I have to complete the entire set-up with their internet and then re-set up my internet back at home. It's kind of a pain
author: Molly Levine
